Get all UserNavDestinations with some limitations.

Parameters:
onlyUnSentNavDestinations Get only unsent UserNavDestinations.
onlyNavigatorLastContact Get only UserNavDestinations for UserNavigators where last contact was successfull.
navID Get only UserNavDestinations for a specific UserNavigator, 0 means any UserNavigator.
navAddress Get only UserNavDestinations with a specific address, "" means any UserNavigator.
